method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _class_globals
method.comment: Class module

method.name: _compareto
method.comment: Comparison: Compares the selected date with a given (year, month, day) date. Return the number of years, months or days...

method.name: _comparetoiso
method.comment: Comparison: Compares the selected date with a given ISO (yyyy-MM-dd) date. Return the number of years, months or days...

method.name: _getdate
method.comment: Get date: Returns the date in ISO format yyyy-MM-dd.

method.name: _getdateticks
method.comment: Returns the date in ticks.

method.name: _getdayofmonth
method.comment: Get Day of month: Returns the selected day of month.

method.name: _getdayofyear
method.comment: Get Day of year: Returns the selected day of year.

method.name: _gethashcode
method.comment: Get HashCode: Returns the hasCode of the selected date.

method.name: _getmonth
method.comment: Get Month: Returns the selected Month.

method.name: _getyear
method.comment: Get Year: Returns the selected Year.

method.name: _initialize
method.comment:
Initializes Date Picker Ex. IMPORTANT: This class requires JavaFx 8 minimum. Note: The datepicker's default date is today.
Owner: The module that will receive the events. Usually 'Me'. DatePickerNode: The date picker node created from the scene builder. EventName: The name of the event that will be called.

method.name: _isafter
method.comment: Comparison: Return True if the selected date is after the specified (year, month, day) date.

method.name: _isafteriso
method.comment: Comparison: Return True if the selected date is after the specified ISO (yyyy-MM-dd) date.

method.name: _isbefore
method.comment: Comparison: Return True if the selected date is before the specified (year, month, day) date.

method.name: _isbeforeiso
method.comment: Comparison: Return True if the selected date is before the specified ISO (yyyy-MM-dd) date.

method.name: _isequal
method.comment: Comparison: Return True if the selected date is equal (i.e same day) to the specified (year, month, day) date.

method.name: _isequaliso
method.comment: Comparison: Return True if the selected date is equal (i.e same day) to the specified ISO (yyyy-MM-dd) date.

method.name: _isleapyear
method.comment: Is Leap year: Return true if selected year is a leap year.

method.name: _lengthofmonth
method.comment: Length of month: Return number of days in the selected month.

method.name: _lengthofyear
method.comment: Length of year: Return number of days in the selected year.

method.name: _minusdays
method.comment: Substract date: Substract days from the selected date.

method.name: _minusmonths
method.comment: Substract date: Substract months from the selected date.

method.name: _minusweeks
method.comment: Substract date: Substract weeks from the selected date.

method.name: _minusyears
method.comment: Substract date: Substract years from the selected date.

method.name: _now
method.comment: Sets the selected date to today.

method.name: _plusdays
method.comment: Add date: Adds days to the selected date.

method.name: _plusmonths
method.comment: Add date: Adds months to the selected date.

method.name: _plusweeks
method.comment: Add date: Adds weeks to the selected date.

method.name: _plusyears
method.comment: Add date: Adds years to the selected date.

method.name: _setautocorrectdates
method.comment:
Autocorrect: Set weither the invalid dates should be corrected before processing. If set to False, an error will be thrown by java in case of invalid date.
Example: "2014-1-32" would be corrected to "2014-01-31" and (2014, 1, 32) would be corrected to (2014, 1, 31).

method.name: _setdate
method.comment: Set date: Sets the selected date to specified year, month and day of month.

method.name: _setdateiso
method.comment: Set date - ISO: Sets the selected date to specified date in ISO format yyyy-MM-dd.

method.name: _setdateticks
method.comment: Set date - Ticks: Sets the selected date to specified date in ticks.

method.name: _seteditable
method.comment: Editable: Enable / disable the possibility to edit the text.

method.name: _setenabled
method.comment: Enabled: Enable / disable the control.

method.name: _setopened
method.comment: Opened = True / False displays the pop-up datepicker. also returns if the datepicker is visible or not.

method.name: _setshowweeknumbers
method.comment: Week numbers: Displays the week numbers on the left side of the datepicker.

method.name: _settag
method.comment: Tag: sets / gets the tag for this control.

method.name: _setvisible
method.comment: Visible: sets / gets visibility for this control.

property.name: _autocorrectdates
property.comment:
Autocorrect: Set weither the invalid dates should be corrected before processing. If set to False, an error will be thrown by java in case of invalid date.
Example: "2014-1-32" would be corrected to "2014-01-31" and (2014, 1, 32) would be corrected to (2014, 1, 31).

property.name: _editable
property.comment: Editable: Enable / disable the possibility to edit the text.

property.name: _opened
property.comment: Opened = True / False displays the pop-up datepicker. also returns if the datepicker is visible or not.

property.name: _showweeknumbers
property.comment: Week numbers: Displays the week numbers on the left side of the datepicker.

property.name: _tag
property.comment: Tag: sets / gets the tag for this control.

property.name: _visible
property.comment: Visible: sets / gets visibility for this control.
